verses.verse: Brothers, <S%G80><s%> my heart's <S%G2588><s%> desire <S%G2107><s%> and prayer <S%G1162><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> for Israel <S%G2474><s%> is, that they might be saved. <S%G4991><s%>
For I bear <S%G3140><s%> them record <S%G3140><s%> that they have <S%G2192><s%> a zeal <S%G2205><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> but not according <S%G2596><s%> to knowledge. <S%G1922><s%>

For they being ignorant <S%G50><s%> of God's <S%G2316><s%> righteousness, <S%G1343><s%> and going <S%G2212><s%> about <S%G2212><s%> to establish <S%G2476><s%> their own <S%G2398><s%> righteousness, <S%G1343><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> not submitted <S%G5293><s%> themselves to the righteousness <S%G1343><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>
For Christ <S%G5547><s%> is the end <S%G5056><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%> for righteousness <S%G1343><s%> to every <S%G3956><s%> one <S%G3956><s%> that believes. <S%G4100><s%>

For Moses <S%G3475><s%> describes <S%G1125><s%> the righteousness <S%G1343><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is of the law, <S%G3551><s%> That the man <S%G444><s%> which does <S%G4160><s%> those <S%G846><s%> things shall live <S%G2198><s%> by them.

But the righteousness <S%G1343><s%> which is of faith <S%G4102><s%> speaks <S%G3004><s%> on this <S%G3779><s%> wise, Say <S%G2036><s%> not in your <S%G4675><s%> heart, <S%G2588><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> shall ascend <S%G305><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> heaven? <S%G3772><s%> (that is, to bring <S%G2609><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> down <S%G2609><s%> from above:)

Or, <S%G2228><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> shall descend <S%G2597><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the deep? <S%G12><s%> (that is, to bring <S%G321><s%> up Christ <S%G5547><s%> again <S%G321><s%> from the dead. <S%G3498><s%>)

But what <S%G5101><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> it? The word <S%G4487><s%> is near <S%G1451><s%> you, even in your mouth, <S%G4750><s%> and in your heart: <S%G2588><s%> that is, the word <S%G4487><s%> of faith, <S%G4102><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> we preach; <S%G2784><s%>

That if <S%G1437><s%> you shall confess <S%G3670><s%> with your mouth <S%G4750><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and shall believe <S%G4100><s%> in your <S%G4675><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> that God <S%G2316><s%> has raised <S%G1453><s%> him from the dead, <S%G3498><s%> you shall be saved. <S%G4982><s%>
For with the heart <S%G2588><s%> man believes <S%G4100><s%> to righteousness; <S%G1343><s%> and with the mouth <S%G4750><s%> confession <S%G3670><s%> is made <S%G3670><s%> to salvation. <S%G4991><s%>
For the scripture <S%G1124><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> Whoever <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> believes <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> him shall not be ashamed. <S%G2617><s%>

For there is no <S%G3756><s%> difference <S%G1293><s%> between the Jew <S%G2453><s%> and the Greek: <S%G1672><s%> for the same <S%G846><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> over all <S%G3956><s%> is rich <S%G4147><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> that call <S%G1941><s%> on him.
For whoever <S%G3956><s%> shall call <S%G1941><s%> on the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> shall be saved. <S%G4982><s%>

How <S%G4459><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> shall they call <S%G1941><s%> on <S%G1941><s%> him in whom <S%G3739><s%> they have not believed? <S%G4100><s%> and how <S%G4459><s%> shall they believe <S%G4100><s%> in him of whom <S%G3739><s%> they have not heard? <S%G191><s%> and how <S%G4459><s%> shall they hear <S%G191><s%> without <S%G5565><s%> a preacher? <S%G2784><s%>

And how <S%G5613><s%> shall they preach, <S%G2784><s%> except <S%G3362><s%> they be sent? <S%G649><s%> as it is written, <S%G1125><s%> How beautiful <S%G5611><s%> are the feet <S%G4228><s%> of them that preach <S%G2097><s%> the gospel <S%G2097><s%> of peace, <S%G1515><s%> and bring <S%G2097><s%> glad <S%G2097><s%> tidings <S%G2097><s%> of good <S%G18><s%> things! <S%G18><s%>

But they have not all <S%G3956><s%> obeyed <S%G5219><s%> the gospel. <S%G2098><s%> For Esaias <S%G2268><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> has believed <S%G4100><s%> our report? <S%G189><s%>
So <S%G686><s%> then <S%G686><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> comes by hearing, <S%G189><s%> and hearing <S%G189><s%> by the word <S%G4487><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

But I say, <S%G3004><s%> Have they not heard? <S%G191><s%> Yes <S%G3304><s%> truly, <S%G3304><s%> their sound <S%G5353><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the earth, <S%G1093><s%> and their words <S%G4487><s%> to the ends <S%G4009><s%> of the world. <S%G3625><s%>

But I say, <S%G3004><s%> Did not Israel <S%G2474><s%> know? <S%G1097><s%> First <S%G4413><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> I will provoke <S%G3863><s%> you to jealousy by them that are no <S%G3756><s%> people, <S%G1484><s%> and by a foolish <S%G801><s%> nation <S%G1484><s%> I will anger <S%G3949><s%> you.

But Esaias <S%G2268><s%> is very <S%G662><s%> bold, <S%G662><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> I was found <S%G2147><s%> of them that sought <S%G2212><s%> me not; I was made <S%G1096><s%> manifest <S%G1717><s%> to them that asked <S%G1905><s%> not after <S%G1905><s%> me.

But to Israel <S%G2474><s%> he said, <S%G3004><s%> All <S%G3650><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> long I have stretched <S%G1600><s%> forth <S%G1600><s%> my hands <S%G5495><s%> to a disobedient <S%G544><s%> and gainsaying <S%G483><s%> people. <S%G2992><s%>
